testsuite.name: Get the geolocalization information

testcase.name: Get the geolocation information with valid data
Try to Get the geolocalization information with wrong data #1
Try to Get the geolocalization information with wrong data #2
Try to Get the geolocalization information with wrong data #3

testsuite.system-out: |-- 1: Get the geolocation information with valid data ({latitude=-10, longitude=20}) |---- Given the user wants to get the geolocalization information |------ User connect |---- When the user put the 20 and -10 |------ User consume |-------- user executes a GET on the resource timezoneJSON |---- Then the user gets the geolocalization information | countryCode | timezoneId | countryName | | AO | Africa/Luanda | Angola | |------ Then countryCode should be 'AO' |------ Then timezoneId should be 'Africa/Luanda' |------ Then countryName should be 'Angola' |-- 1: Try to Get the geolocalization information with wrong data ({longitude=180, latitude=90, message=no timezone information found for lat/lng}) |---- Given the user wants to get the geolocalization information |------ User connect |---- When the user put the wrong 180 and 90 |------ User consume |-------- user executes a GET on the resource timezoneJSON |---- Then the user do not gets the geolocalization information and show no timezone information found for lat/lng |------ Message obtained: no timezone information found for lat/lng |-- 2: Try to Get the geolocalization information with wrong data ({longitude=-200, latitude=-100, message=invalid lat/lng}) |---- Given the user wants to get the geolocalization information |------ User connect |---- When the user put the wrong -200 and -100 |------ User consume |-------- user executes a GET on the resource timezoneJSON |---- Then the user do not gets the geolocalization information and show invalid lat/lng |------ Message obtained: invalid lat/lng |-- 3: Try to Get the geolocalization information with wrong data ({longitude=200, latitude=100, message=invalid lat/lng}) |---- Given the user wants to get the geolocalization information |------ User connect |---- When the user put the wrong 200 and 100 |------ User consume |-------- user executes a GET on the resource timezoneJSON |---- Then the user do not gets the geolocalization information and show invalid lat/lng |------ Message obtained: invalid lat/lng
